globalSubscriptionId.name: subscriptionId
globalSubscriptionId.description: The subscription id, which appears in the path, always modeled in credentials. The value is always '1234-5678-9012-3456'

globalApiVersion.name: api-version
globalApiVersion.description: The api version, which appears in the query, the value is always '2015-07-01-preview'
